name: iApplication
body:
### Welcome to our open source iApplication website.
This package contains an iOS implementation of a real-time chat application. You can find the open source code here : ([iTalk](https://github.com/iApplication/iTalk))

### Description

* Clean: Code is very succinct. There are little nasty guarding code that distracts readers' attention.
* Easy to learn: The code is heavily commented.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
